mapper.select: select st.stockNo, st.stockCodeNo, stcd.stockName, stcd.price, st.s_number, stcd.standard ,st.s_regDate from stock st join stockcode stcd where st.stockCodeNo = stcd.stockCodeNo and s_type = 'remain'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STOCK (s_regDate, s_number, storeCode, s_price, stockCodeNo, s_type) select SYSDATE(), #{snumber}, "outback001", sc.price *#{snumber} ,stockCodeNo , "require" FROM STOCKCODE SC where sc.stockname = #{stockName}
mapper.select: select st.stockNo, stcd.stockName,st.s_number, st.s_price, st.s_regDate from stock st join stockcode stcd on st.stockcodeNo = stcd.stockcodeNo where s_type= #{stockType}
